attributes.action: STOP ALL MOTORISTS FROM PARKING ON ALL PAVEMENTS.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Parking in my CITY OF MANCHESTER has got out of hand and now there are far more people who park on the pavements than on the road,in a lot of cases you have to walk on the road to pass them and its a waste of time telling the local police,as i have seen them just driving passed theses parkers and do nothing at all.
 WAKE UP AND GET IT SORTED.
 I have been driving for over 30 years daily and have NEVER parked on a pavement as its against the law but most drivers dont seem to know that anymore.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
